abstract: One of Latin America’s largest banks continues to push into global private banking as Brazil’s economy contracts.
snippet: One of Latin America’s largest banks continues to push into global private banking as Brazil’s economy contracts.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — The Brazilian investment bank BTG Pactual has received approval from the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority to acquire the Swiss private bank BSI, and in doing so concluded the transaction, the firm, based in São Paulo, said on Tuesday.

headline.main: BTG Pactual Is Cleared to Acquire Swiss Private Bank BSI
